title: Der kleine Vegetarier
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Pizza, International, Organic, Western, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Bakery
description: Small and casual vegetarian restaurant offering dishes such as spaghetti bolognese, Asian noodle stir fry, and vegan pizza with pesto. Dishes with cream can be prepared with oat cream upon request. Ingredients are around 80% organic. There is also a bakery with organic breads and pastries. Breakfast served weekdays. Could call 30 minutes ahead for takeaway.
